alert.note: Alert for San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN SOCORRO COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northwest of Magdalena, or 27 miles northeast of Datil, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Alamo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains
